Yet financing is urgently needed and Hungary is still blocking 50 billion euros in long-term assistance to Kyiv.

sentences.sentence: If this is not possible, we are prepared for an agreement by 26, but I strongly support and prefer an agreement by 27. Also in Davos, President von der Leyen met with Li Qiang, Premier of the People's Republic of China, where they discussed the growing trade imbalances.

sentences.sentence: The specter of inflation continues to trouble Europe's economy, even if the battle is gradually wearing down.

Moreover, the war in the Middle East and in particular disruptions to shipping mean that there's always a danger of increase in energy prices that would fuel inflation. A potential trade conflict between China and the US could also have a negative impact on Europe's climate goals, Javorczyk believes. My fear is that escalating trade tensions may lead to new restrictions of export of critical raw materials and therefore may jeopardize green transition.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Farmers and lorry drivers continue to protest in Romania.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: On Monday night, the access to the ports of Constanta and Brasov were blocked, while dozens of trucks once again interrupted road traffic.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Earlier in the day, government and farmers' associations met for talks.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Hours later, the Romanian Minister of Agriculture said most of the demands had been met, a claim denied by the protesters.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Farmers are demanding faster subsidy payments, compensation for losses caused by imports from neighboring Ukraine, and more state aid for fuel costs, amongst other demands.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Truck drivers are calling for lower tax and insurance rates and have complained about lengthy waiting times at the borders.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: As Spanish cities grapple with the invasion of electric scooters, Valencia has become

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: the first region to introduce a traffic law to control them.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: From now on, electric scooters will have to be registered and display a license plate.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: In addition, they will be limited to a speed of 25 kilometers per hour and users will require a mandatory insurance that costs between 20 and 90 euros per year.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Those failing to comply with the new rules could face fines ranging between 100 and 1,000 euros.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Jose Mourinho is leaving AS Roma with immediate effect.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: After its 3-1 loss against Milan on Sunday, the club now risks missing the Champions League for a sixth straight season.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Mourinho was in his third season at Roma.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: He led the club to the UEFA Conference League title in his first season and the European League finals last year.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: But his behaviour towards referees has often been controversial.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: He was suspended from the Milan game this weekend due to his protests.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Former Roma captain Daniel De Rossi and Antonio Conte are possible contenders to take over.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Argentinian star Lionel Messi has become the first footballer to be named FIFA Men's Player of the Year for the third time.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Unable to attend the ceremony in London, his award was accepted on his behalf by the event's co-host Thierry Henry.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Spain's World Cup winner Aitana Bonmati took the award for best women's player.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: While England boss Serena Wichmann won the best women's coach for the second success of year and a fourth time.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
